text: Paulo César dos Santos (September 6, 1952 – December 14, 2020), better known as Paulinho, was a Brazilian singer and percussionist. He was a member of the group Roupa Nova. He was born in Rio de Janeiro. Paulinho died at the age of 68, from multiple organ failure and cardiopulmonary arrest caused by COVID-19 in Rio de Janeiro. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from multiple organ failure Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Rio de Janeiro Category:Singers from Rio de Janeiro Category:Musicians from Rio de Janeiro Category:Deaths from cardiopulmonary arrest
title: Paulo César dos Santos
